Click the "bilibili" icon to open the bilibili application.
Click the profile icon located in the top left corner to access the user profile page.
Click the "Home" button located in the bottom left corner of the screen to navigate to the main page.
Click the text field "小米yu7发布会" to input a search term.
Click the "Cancel" button, returning to the main interface of the application.
Input "美食" in the search bar.
Open the "bilibili" application.
Click the 'bilibili' app icon.
Click the menu button, represented by three horizontal lines, to access additional options or settings.
